My Team

function createCard (employees) { if (role == "Manager") { return`

${employees.name}

${employees.role}

  • ID: ${employees.id}
  • Email: ${employees.email}
  • Office Number: ${employees.officeNumber}
` } else if (role == "Engineer") { return`

${name}

${role}

  • ID: ${id}
  • Email: ${email}
  • GitHub Profile: ${github}
` } else if (role == "Intern") { return`

${name}

${role}

  • ID: ${id}
  • Email: ${email}
  • School: ${school}
` } }
